## HeadersMiddleware class

Middleware that is used for setting custom http headers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HeadersMiddleware implements RestMiddleware 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [RestMiddleware](./rest.restmiddleware.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [run(this, \_id, \_target, \_methodName, descriptor, \_args, request, next)](./rest.headersmiddleware.run.md) |  | Runs code that is defined for this rest middleware, in this method you can modify request and response |
